CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1964, pg. 6, reads: "THE SQUAWS - Members of the smart Squaws Club pose prettily for the cameraman during intermission at their pretty formal ball held last Friday night at the Pittsburgh Hilton. Left to right, first row: Alice Cralle, Josephine Bagley, Sarah Primas, Johnnie Matthews, Rebecca Hairston, president; Martha Tames, Laura Steward and Mary Shelton.  Last row: Emily Nickens, Cecelia Jones, Marion Williams, Ruth Moorer, Elisabeth Giddens, Ethel Chavis, Lee Shelton, Betty Watkins and Alma Davis. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seventeen women from Squaws Club wearing feathers in hair, front row: Alice Cralle, Josephine Bagley, Sarah Primas, Johnnie Matthews, Rebecca Hairston, Martha Tames, Laura Steward and Mary Shelton, last row: Emily Nickens, Cecelia Jones, Marion Williams, Ruth Moorer, Elisabeth Giddens, Ethel Chavis, Lee Shelton, Betty Watkins and Alma Davis posed in Hilton Hotel for anniversary ball, another version
